headline: PTC Launches Arena Supply Chain Intelligence to Help Manufacturers and Product Companies Mitigate Supply Chain Risks
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced the release of its Arena® product lifecycle management (PLM) and quality management system (QMS) solution's new Supply Chain Intelligence (SCI) offering. The Arena SCI™ offering continuously checks for emerging risks from evolving supply chain conditions and eliminates the need for disconnected supply chain tools by embedding real-time, AI-driven component monitoring and risk mitigation insight directly into product development workflows.
